categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks

nodes.text: Il faut sauver Miss Pickalho  was a roleplaying adventure written for Casus Belli HS24 by Philippe Rat. Most of the adventure takes place on Coruscant. This adventure was designed for the SWD6 system. The playable characters discover miss Jennie Pickhalo, currently working at the Chandrilla embassy on Coruscant, witnessed atrocities commited by the Galactic Empire's forces. Now they must find and save her, before the imperial agents reduce her to silence. This story takes place during the Destruction of Alderaan.
